ss:description.ss:name: Gemini
ss:description.ss:brief: A small freighter designed for planetary landings and jump capability. Its oversized repulsors allow landing in most conditions. The Gemini is completely unarmed.
ss:description.ss:physical: A simple design which relies on brute force rather than aerodynamic sleekness to navigate atmospheres.
ss:description.ss:background: Built at Kamurinmur Dockyards, it was designed for a particular niche which it fills very well. However, most people didn't need the good planetary performance, and those that did were often on the wrong side of the law and required something capable of defending itself.
